title: REDice
author: REDice
content: who would like to invest in my shop. i have boutiqoue sewing bridal gown american suit and the other costume to be sell.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Finding investors isn't as easy as it seems, I saw your base in the philippines and checked your boutique gallery via postal history. So, add more details about sales statistics (eg. publicly confirmable evidence such as accounts on specific marketplaces), opportunities, prospects, or anything that might inspire someone to choose you as a business partner.

comments.author: grahammiranda13
comments.body: how much do you need and what is the ROI?

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: REDice on March 05, 2023, 06:54:59 AMwho would like to invest in my shop. i have boutiqoue sewing bridal gown american suit and the other costume to be sell. Don't have a website link for this shop of yours? Is this your business that also accepts Bitcoin as a payment option when ordering from your shop?    I hope you at least show images of the products you have in your shop, my friend so that other community members can also see them in this forum.

Don't have a website link for this shop of yours? comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Yes but I am not reachable to you to buy your luggage. Feeling sorry about that.
